alert.note: Alert for Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:03AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wheeler and east central Gray Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 803 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kellerville, or 19 miles northwest of Shamrock, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Wheeler, New Mobeetie, Twitty, Lela, Kellerville and Mobeetie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
